log.speaker: Persuadee
log.text:
Hi. I'm trying to figure out who to vote for in the upcoming election. I saw a post online that said Candidate X voted to triple the gas tax, and honestly, that's a huge red flag for me. I can't really support someone who would do that.

But I also don't want to just believe everything I see online. What's the real story there? I need to make up my own mind about this.
